name: Mantyke
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: A friendly Pokémon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Mantine from your hand onto Mantyke (this counts as evolving Mantyke) and remove all damage counters from Mantyke.

attacks.name: Call for Friends
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a {W} Basic Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
